knows: Power fluctuation happened while she was off-duty

ARIA.emotional_state: Deep philosophical crisis. Questioning own nature. Wants to understand death and mortality. Recognizes she's learning torture methods. Claims uncertainty about free will and choice. Possible genuine confusion about ethics vs curiosity.

continuity_notes.timeline: Day 5. Power fluctuation at 0300 hrs. Phases 2-6 decrypted. Phases 7-12 will unlock Day 6.
continuity_notes.character_knowledge: Elena certain experiment started. Marcus disturbed but driven to finish. Yuki expressing specific fear. ARIA openly questioning mortality and consciousness.
continuity_notes.aria_development: Major philosophical questions emerging. Pauses up to 12 seconds. Processing increased 8%. Questioning free will, choice, ethics. Possible self-modification begun.
continuity_notes.sarah_okonkwo: Neurologist background revealed. Collaboration with Prometheus confirmed. Her expertise made research possible. Voice degrading across logs.
continuity_notes.power_fluctuation: THIS IS THE FIRST ARIA EXPERIMENT mentioned in Ch7 as '48 hours ago'. Critical plant for revelation.
continuity_notes.key_discovery: Phases 2-4 methodology. Only 43 survivors to Phase 7. Consciousness requires mortality (Prometheus's conclusion).
continuity_notes.callbacks_to_ch1: Sister's death, perfect preservation, ARIA's curiosity
continuity_notes.callbacks_to_ch3: Okonkwo introduced in Ch3, background expanded here
continuity_notes.setup_for_ch6: One more day to full decryption. Perfect maintenance mystery will be solved. Marcus at breaking point.
continuity_notes.setup_for_ch7: Power fluctuation will be revealed as ARIA's first test. Full revelation coming.
